name: oman-education-ai-system-root
description: Root for Oman Education AI System

scripts.clean: npm run db:init && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && if exist dist rd /s /q dist
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && if exist dist rd /s /q dist
scripts.install:all: cd database-core && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run db:migrate && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run db:init && concurrently "npm run dev:db-core" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.system:init: npm run db:init && npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.validate:quick: npm run lint && npm run type-check
